name: Desert Planet
description:
This is a survival game prototype still under development which is being submitted to Can You Survive this Jam? Travel around a desolate landscape based on real-world terrain data taken from Death Valley, the Sahara Desert, and the Namibia Desert. Find water and plants to regain your lost water. Stay in the tent and rest during the day. Come out at night to conserve your water.

Use "T" to create a preview tent, and Enter to spawn it. If within range, hit Enter again to pack up the tent.

Use L to turn the flashlight on and off.
